column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jessica - Thanks for your review. Please know that if there's ever anything wrong with your meal at the time you are served
column2: we are always happy to replace the item or offer you an alternative. We hope that you'll visit us again
column4: please ask for a manager to assist you with your ordering. He or she will make sure your dining experience is vastly superior to this one. Thanks again.
